title: Administrative & Client Services Assistant (With Good Communication Skills)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a reliable and detail-oriented Administrative & Client Services Assistant to join our team. You’ll play a key role in supporting our daily operations, helping us stay organized, and ensuring clients receive excellent support. This role is perfect for someone with strong communication skills, a proactive mindset, and a passion for helping others.

Key Responsibilities:
– Provide administrative support to the management team (e.g., data entry, scheduling, email handling)
– Communicate with clients via email, chat, or calls in a professional and friendly manner
– Monitor and respond to client inquiries or concerns in a timely manner
– Help manage project timelines and follow up on tasks when needed
– Assist in preparing reports, documents, or presentations
– Coordinate with other teaUpgrade to see actual infombers to ensure smooth operations
– Perform other related tasks as assigned

Qualifications:
– Excellent written and verbal English communication skills
– At least 1 year of experience in an admin or customer service role (preferred but not required)
– Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
– Proficient with Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Gmail, etc.)
– Can work independently and follow instructions with minimal supervision
– Friendly, professional, and proactive attitude

Bonus Points if You Have:
– Experience working with international clients
– Background in CRM tools, project management tools, or customer support platforms
